long_description: Lightweight and breathable, the Astral Camino 200 PFD is a great choice for kayaking, canoeing, rafting or stand up paddling in warm weather. AIRESCAPE(R) technology minimizes vest contact with your torso and uses specialized ports to vent heat. Nylon outer shell provides superior abrasion resistance and durability; open-weave mesh liner promotes evaporation. Durable polyethylene foam offers light weight and high flotation. 2 large cargo pockets store extras and zip closed to keep track of small items. Dial in the fit using the adjustable 1 in. webbing side straps and the adjustable shoulder straps. 4-way lash tab on front lets you secure accessories such as a safety light or knife (not included). Reflective highlights increase visibility in dim light. The Astral Camino 200 PFD is compatible with a quick-release towing belt and includes a sturdy attachment point for a carabiner behind each pocket (belt not included).
short_description: Lightweight and breathable, the Astral Camino 200 PFD is a great choice for kayaking, canoeing, rafting or stand up paddling in warm weather.
